result.name: client-and-cost-management-system-ccms
result.notes: System enabling applications for certificated civil legal aid to be applied for online by providers (legal aid solicitors). Processed by Legal Aid Agency staff and for the management and payments to and from the Legal Aid Fund. The system contains client (personal and financial) details including means and merits assessment and benefit status checking details; case management information. For example details of the category of law,  any statutory charge and any contributions required from the client. Also  includes payment information, including billing requests from legal aid providers/counsel and details of payments made to them.

organization.name: ministry-of-justice
organization.title: Ministry of Justice
organization.description:
We work to protect the public and reduce reoffending, and to provide a more effective, transparent and responsive criminal justice system for victims and the public.

MOJ is a ministerial department, supported by 37 agencies and public bodies.
